thread.title: Bar Refaeli's Wedding Dress Is Just as Stunning as You Would Imagine
thread.title_full: Bar Refaeli's Wedding Dress Is Just as Stunning as You Would Imagine

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Bar Refaeli's Wedding Dress Is Just as Stunning as You Would Imagine
text:
Supermodel Bar Refaeli recently had a magical evening in Israel — she got married to her new groom, businessman Adi Ezra. In front of 300 guests, the two wed last Thursday at the Carmel Forest Spa Resort in Haifa, Israel, according to People magazine .
On Wednesday, Bar posted a photo from the wedding on Instagram, and she looked drop-dead gorgeous in her lacy Chloé gown. Stunning, but also surprisingly casual: Bar seems to have opted to go without a veil, and her husband was not wearing a suit.
The happiest day of my life ! I married my best friend ✨ Live, Laugh, Love together forever More pics exclusively in @holacom magazine
A photo posted by Bar Refaeli (@barrefaeli) on Sep 30, 2015 at 12:21am PDT
More From Cosmopolitan "The happiest day of my life! I married my best friend. Live, Laugh, Love together forever," she gushed on the post.
In the days leading up to Bar's wedding, she posted some seeeeriously FOMO-inducing photos on Instagram. First, she hosted a boho chic bachelorette party ...
מה זה כל הטוב הזה ?!? #Barchchelorette
A photo posted by Bar Refaeli (@barrefaeli) on Sep 20, 2015 at 7:34am PDT
Then, she drank 100-year-old Louis XIII cognac with old friends ...
Thanks for the ultimate wedding gift @LouisXIIIcognac @emmace_ & @luduplessis for 100 years of friendship #drinkingtime
A photo posted by Bar Refaeli (@barrefaeli) on Sep 22, 2015 at 7:07am PDT
And, finally, she dove into a pool, veil first, as one does right before diving into marriage.
Head first
A photo posted by Bar Refaeli (@barrefaeli) on Sep 20, 2015 at 2:53pm PDT
Congrats to the newlyweds!
Follow Morgan on Twitter.
